Abstract: INTERNATIONAL   A11, 13-19    Yeltsin Resigns, Naming Putin as Acting President  Boris N. Yeltsin shocked Russia and the world, announcing his resignation as president six months before the end of his term and handing over power to his favored successor, Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin, above. By appointing Mr. Putin acting president, Mr. Yeltsin seemed determined to put a lock on Mr. Putin's succession to the presidency.   A11
